Judul: CORRELATION BETWEEN AUDIENCE DEMOGRAPHY WITH TV WATCHING HABIT IN BANDUNG AND JAKARTA
Abstrak: This final project identifies the audience behavior in watching television to map each segment preference in watching TV based on demographic such profession, gender, and age. The behavior includes frequency, duration, favorite channel, favorite show, and behavior towards TV advertising. The research only covers 10 TV stations which occur in Indonesia.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Ir. Budi Permadi Iskandar MSP.
Kata Kunci: TV Advertising, Demographic, Engagement, Frequency, TV Programs.
